title: Jealousy & A Jewelled Proposition
description: "I WON'T MAKE PROMISES I CAN'T KEEP."Ever since their one night together, making love again to Rachel Kincaid was all Matt Hammond thought about. That and destroying the Blackstone diamond empire and avenging his family. Poised for a take-over, Matt cursed fate for bringing Rachel back now --- as nanny to his motherless son. Nights with her in his house tortured him, like the Blackstones did. Matt was possessed by revenge and obsessed by a woman. The billionaire always got what he wanted, but now did he want sweet revenge ... or sweet Rachel's love?
author: Yvonne Lindsay
